Package view

The view package contains all the visual elements of this game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardView
    Shows card image relative to given card value.
    CreditsSubScene
    Sub scene showing game credits.
    EndSubScene
    End sub scene is shown when game is over.
    GameView
    Game view manages the views for the game scene.
    HelpSubScene
    The help sub scene contains general instructions for the player to navigate the menu stage.
    InfoLabel
    A customised label for use in SnapSubScenes.
    InstructionsSubScene
    The instructions subscene contains game-play instructions.
    MenuView
    Menu view manages the views for the menu scene.
    NameDialog
    The NameDialog class can create a pop-up dialog to collect player names for the game.
    PileView
    This class visualises the current state of the communal pile.
    PlayerView
    The player view displays the state of each player.
    ScoreSubScene
    The ScoreSubScene is a view for the ScoreCard Object.
    SnapActionView
    This view displays the results of a snap action.
    SnapButton
    A customized button to be used throughout subscenes.
    SnapCheckBox
    A number/check box pair to be used to gather user input.
    SnapSubScene
    Abstract subscene class, with basic aesthetics and functionality for all subscenes.
    StartSubScene  

Package view Description

The view package contains all the visual elements of this game. It is primarily divided into two views, the menu view, and the game view. Within those views there are numerous sub-scenes and sub-views.
